summary: Disc-like chakram weapons like in the game Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning
descriptionHtml:
This here are chakrams. They are not throwable like KoA:Reckoning game nor do they have effects like lightning or fire. They are creatable under daedric category and slightly stronger than daedric dagger. The sheathing position is as good as it will get since its a round disc and not a straight blade it is awkwardly positioned when sheathed.

 [youtube]CAkgNWyfW84[/youtube]
author: siberok92
